org.araneaframework.http.core
Class StandardServletServiceAdapterComponent

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.BaseComponent
      org.araneaframework.http.core.StandardServletServiceAdapterComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, Serializable, ServletServiceAdapterComponent
public class StandardServletServiceAdapterComponent
extends BaseComponent
implements ServletServiceAdapterComponent

Creates a StandardServletInputData and StandardServletOutputData from the HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse respectively and routes the request to the child services using a null Path.

Since 1.0.3 this adapter makes OutputData and InputData accessible from Component's Environment:

InputData input = (InputData)getEnvironment().getEntry(InputData.class);
OutputData input = (OutputData)getEnvironment().getEntry(OutputData.class);

which allows access to request from BaseComponent's initialization callback—init().

"Toomas RÃ¶mer"
